title: Wildlife Getaway Bandhavgarh: Syna Tiger Resort
description: Embark on an exciting safari getaway at the Syna Tiger Resort. Stay two nights in a Garden View Luxury Cottage and enjoy included daily breakfasts, lunches and dinners, a private bush dining experience, four complimentary cocktails each night and a Jeep safari around the buffer zone with packed meals and more for two adults.
offer_address: Tala, Bandhavgarh National Park, Tehsil; Manpur, District; Umaria, M.P. Pin-484661
